question: Which country houses the second-largest monolith in the world "Sibebe Rock"?
explanation: Sibebe Rock is located in Eswatini. It is the second-largest monolith in the world and the largest exposed granite pluton/dome. This three-billion-year-old volcanic slab is the world's largest granite dome. This rock hosts the annual "Sibebe Rock Climb" event and the winner will be tagged as "Sibebe Survivor".
